title: Turntable For Assets LightRig
description: Asset Turntable Lighting Plugin: A one-click turntable video production plugin with consistent lighting and HDRI flexibility for asset creators.
longDescription:
hello. I created a plugin called ‘Asset Turntable Lighting Plugin’.

This plug-in is a powerful tool that allows anyone to quickly and easily perform photorealistic rendering without complex scene setup processes.

Even on large projects, this plugin allows you to work with assets under consistent lighting settings, ensuring consistent results.

  • Using this plugin, you can create a turntable video for your assets without complicated settings.
  • You can quickly create turntable videos by creating a turntable sequencer for assets with one click.
  • You can maintain a consistent lighting environment for asset confirmation.
  • You can also apply your preferred HDRI.


I think it will be very useful for environment workers, and through this plug-in, you can create turntable videos of various assets under the same Unreal environment.

We hope that you will find it useful for various communications that occur during the asset production process.


안녕하세요. 'Asset Turntable Lighting Plugin'을 소개합니다.

이 플러그인은 복잡한 씬 설정 없이도 누구나 손쉽게 포토리얼리스틱 렌더링을 할 수 있게 도와주는 강력한 도구입니다.

대규모 프로젝트에서도 이 플러그인을 사용하면 자산을 일관된 조명 설정 하에 작업할 수 있어 항상 일관된 결과를 얻을 수 있습니다.

이 플러그인을 사용하면 복잡한 설정 없이도 자산의 턴테이블 영상을 만들 수 있습니다. 한 번의 클릭만으로 자산의 턴테이블 시퀀서를 생성해 빠르게 턴테이블 영상을 제작할 수 있습니다. 자산 확인을 위한 일관된 조명 환경을 유지할 수 있으며, 선호하는 HDRI도 적용할 수 있습니다.

환경 아티스트들에게 매우 유용할 것이라고 생각하며, 이 플러그인을 통해 다양한 자산의 턴테이블 영상을 동일한 언리얼 환경에서 손쉽게 제작할 수 있습니다.

이 플러그인이 자산 제작 과정에서 발생하는 다양한 커뮤니케이션에 도움이 되기를 바랍니다.


Demo reel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3u5GDHSom2Y
technicalDetails:
(Tutorial Part 1) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yQ7vD5UtXso&t=3s

(Tutorial Part 2) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wZUidPwYhBo

C++ Code: The project contains a total of 6 C++ files, totalling 228 lines of code. 

Blueprints: A total of 10 blueprints were used.

One is the main editor utility widget that sets up the turntable, and the rest are all blueprints needed to configure turntable settings. 

Meshes and Assets: The project contains 4 meshes, 10 materials, 8 material instances, 6 textures, 7 HDRI texture cubes, and 1 Movie Pipeline Primary Config.

Plugins that need to be activated before use

  1. Open plugin editor to activate plugins.
  2. Activate "Turntable for Assets," "Editor Scripting Utilities," "Apple ProRes Media," and "Movie Render Queue."
  3. Restart the engine after activating plugins.

Simple usage

  1. Post-installation, a pink bear icon indicates readiness.
  2. Open the turntable setup panel by clicking the icon.
  3. Activate the panel with the "Turntable for Movies" button and set up via the "Setup" button.
  4. Adjust the lighting environment as needed.
  5. Drag desired assets into the viewport.
  6. Choose the right camera angle for rendering.
  7. If a stage isn't needed, deselect it in the Turntable panel.
  8. Create an asset group for the turntable, generating a BP turntable group in the outliner.
  9. Complete setup, then create key animation for the sequencer.
  10. Open Movie Render Queue, load "Mingdo Render Q Config" pre-sets, set the output path, and press "Render" to output the video.
